source.name: Colorado Schools
source.description: This dataset contains school level information on the School Improvement Grant (SIG) program’s leading indicators. The following leading indicators are included in the dataset: student attendance rates, teacher attendance rates, school year minutes, the number of students who completed advanced coursework, the number of students who completed dual enrollment classes, the number of students who completed advanced coursework and dual enrollment classes, and the number of students who completed advanced coursework or dual enrollment classes.  The dataset includes information on Cohort 1 Tier I and Tier II SIG awarded schools only. Cohort 1 schools began implementing one of the four required intervention models (Transformation, Turnaround, Restart, and School Closure) in school year 2010-11. For more information on this data file, please read the Public File Documentation.
